attributes.action: For the Government to to admit at least 3000 unaccompanied child migrants.
attributes.background: The government committed itself to admitting at least 3000 unaccompanied child migrants into the UK and is now ending this so-called Dubs agreement. The UK government should reinstate this commitment forthwith as it is simply the Right Thing to do.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
